name: Godzilla NES But Your Red
description:
The game is still in development.

But I know the game may seem bad.

But I stop talking now and start about what in this game

The sprites doesn't move yet.

I found things online.  So it a game with images I found online.

Will add sprite for red.

will add more things

-Controls

A - Walk left

D - Walk Right

Also the Arrows key can do left and right

ESC - pause

The game was based off the Godzilla NES Creepypasta and The game that is being development by 

IuriNery

Link to that game

(1) Godzilla Creepypasta by IuriNery - Game Jolt

I wanted to add Red's House for a joke.

IDK why I made this.

Yes I making a April Fools update for this game.
